Parameters: String: the message to use for this exception, may be null
ZoneRulesException(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a new date-time exception with the specified message.

Parameters: String: the message to use for this exception, may be null
Throwable: the cause of the exception, may be null
ZoneRulesException(java.lang.String,java.Description: Constructs a new date-time exception with the specified message and cause.

ClassDesc: Thrown to indicate a problem with time-zone configuration. This exception is used to indicate a problems with the configured time-zone rules.
